name: Gangster Brawl: Mortal Streets
description:
These thugs won't let you escape, you have to beat these criminals with the best you got. Are you ready to defeat them and become the king of Bronx?

You will need the guts to beat these criminals. Years ago the illegal city of Bronx was a nice place to live until the riots started to happen. With no goverment and no rules, the population left the city, now everything is illegal. They run the streets. In a few years they became the kings of Bronx. They are violent people who can't do anything else than combat. They basically bring war to the streets, their rivalry is insane!

Thug city also known as Bronx is the closest thing to hell that you'll ever meet. All kinds of illegal combat are happening here, the Gangsters run everything.

- Defeat all the thugs and gangsters and clean the streets
- Perform illegal deadly combos to end your opponents!
- Unlock tons of new and powerful characters
- You will have to show your skills in 3 insane rounds
- Play with the most dangerous thugs on the planet
- Combat in one of the creepiest places on earth!

Can you defeat all the gangsters in this crazy fight game? Start the battle!
